Text: Ha, I want to see them sending Piratebay a takedown notice like they have been doing to other services distributing this file.

Gotta love all the letters and the whole introduction about how it's completely confidential and it should not be transferred to a digital copy, or left out in the open.
I'm sure there's some elder somewhere who actually sat there and WATCHED someone bind the book for him to keep him from peeking.
And yet here we are downloading it anyway.

I love the internet!
